987: We are a full scale, digital and print marketing solutions manufacturing company. We are looking to hire entry level, to experienced operators for our mailing department! Job Description: This individual will be experienced in, and responsible for: Set-up, operation, and basic maintenance on all mailing equipment. Master Mailer, Ad-Jet, Flow Master, Pinnacle, Wave Jet/Inkjet, Screen Press, IBIS, Tabber. Requirements: Experience operating mailing equipment
